way back, like a hundred years ago or so, it was status to as many typefaces as possible in the same sign or ad. it's like: "hey look at us, we can afford this many typefaces. we are successful."

The best part is that the restaurant is called "shakers." It's pretty much the complete opposite of [Shaker design](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019194835/http:/www.pharm.sunysb.edu/faculty/berrios/shaker.htm).
